name: Holiday Inn Express West Atlantic City

reviews.title: Served the purpose well.
reviews.text: We stayed one night at the Holiday Inn Express and were pleased with the accommodations. The property is clearly not the newest, but it's been updated and furnished nicely. The room was clean and spacious. There was a nice desk area in the room to work and the property was a convenient 10-15 minute drive to the boardwalk/casinos.

reviews.title: Memorial Day Weekend, @ this hotel!
reviews.text: Service was decent, though mechanical. It seemed as though the person at the front desk had said the same thing so many times that she started answering questions even before we were finished asking them. This was a bit off-putting, but we got the answers we needed.
We'd return again if in the area.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel/Good Location

reviews.text: It,was,of course, a busy holiday weekend(Sat.,May26,to Mon.,May 28,2007).But we did find the hotel to be very clean,w/a large parking lot,a clean pool.It's actually in 'Pleasantville, in Egg Harbor Township'.It's in a serene, wooded area,away from the 'hustle + bustle' of the casinos. It''s one mile south of the Garden State Pkwy.,with an exit + entrance,on Blk.Horse Tpke.It's exactly 9 miles to the 'heart of A/C',either way,the Pkwy.or Blk.Horse Tpk.,we like the Pkwy.,faster,no traffic lights.We were very fortunate,one day,coming from a drive in the 'suburbs (of N.J.),'the A/C Expressway,.was completly closed, for about 2 hrs.due to a traffic accident.We got right off,the Pkwy at Blk.Horse Tpke., and waited the accident 'out' in our room.For all practical purposes,A/C was virtually closed, and impossible to reach, by any roads,that afternoon.That was a BIG benefit, of staying on the 'outskirts',of A/C ! The continental breakfast was good and well tended to. No complaints.Bed sizes, are NOT guaranteed!! Non-smoking rooms,are guaranteed.
reviews.title: Good Deal

likes.liked: — Cheap and close to the boardwalk

reviews.title: Clean, Comfty, quiet, So Far
reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for a night with my sister and my father. We were looking for an affordable two rooms, and so everything on the boardwalk was out of the question.

reviews.title: Life Saver
reviews.text: Checked in at the last minute on a friday night for a low internet rate. The front desk staff were friendly and welcoming. Most importantly, the rooms were on the newer/renovated side and the entire hotel was well kept. We had booked another hotel before coming to the Holiday Inn Express but couldn't stay because it was just awful. My advice... make the right "choice" in Atlantic City.

I stayed at this hotel October 20-24. I booked this hotel after reading that there was a complimentary shuttle to the casinos. There is not. This was a huge inconvenience as I was attending late night events in Atlantic City that ended well after the last bus. Taxis have a flat rate fee of $25 not the $5 advertised on the website. Despite these significant problems the hotel itself was clean and comfortable. I did not like having curtains that wouldn't close though. I liked that the rooms were separate from the lobby and front desk. I stayed just inside the exit/entrance. I could walk out my room and be in the lobby in under a minute. The staff from the front desk to housekeeping were outstanding. I particularly enjoyed the extensive continental breakfast. I enjoyed being able to get a hot cup of coffee or tea and a cookie or piece of fruit, day or night. The rate was very affordable. My only complaint is with the false advertising regarding transportation.
reviews.title: Great hotel, transportation inconvenient
HIE Pleasantville was fine by me
reviews.text: I walked in to the lobby at 10:30pm without a reservation on Thursday night having just obtained a refund for a totally unacceptable room in a namebrand, nationwide motel chain next door.

reviews.title: Terrible billing practices
reviews.text: The clerk at the desk was nice and offered me a room at a reasonable rate. The room was clean and cold when we first came in but the heater took care of that quickly. The furnishings were fine and the mattress was great. Everything you expect from Holiday Inn and much, much nicer than the room we had just left.

The most pleasant surprise awaited us in the morning. I normally shy away from Free Continental Breakfasts because they are so bad. All I want is a decent cup of coffee. I was taken back by the variety of breakfast items on display given my previous experiences.
reviews.title: Disappointed

aka: Holiday Inn Express West Atlantic City Hotel
description: Take a Virtual Tour of the hotel.Are you looking for a clean and affordable hotel, but don't want to stay in downtown Atlantic City? The Holiday Inn Express Hotel in West Atlantic City, NJ is a four-story interior corridor hotel with a great room and a full breakfast served from 6:30 AM - 9:30 AM daily. We are located just two miles from FAA Tech Center and Atlantic City Airport. Holiday Inn Express in West Atlantic City is located just 10 minutes from the excitement of the Atlantic City casinos, beaches and boardwalk. We offer a shuttle to the boardwalk for those guests who would prefer not to drive. Every over sized room has a 25-inch TV, free cable and HBO, free high-speed wireless Internet and voice mail, coffee makers, fridges, iron and ironing boards, hair dryers and clock radios. You will fall in love with our brand new king and traditional double bedded rooms with desk and easy chair. Visit Atlantic City, NJ and Stay Smart at the Holiday Inn Express hotel.
